website_summaries.verdict: Well-made pulls from a solid name in the industry. House flippers, DIY renovators, and contractors enjoy the incredibly low bulk rate.
pros: Often used to replace higher-end cabinet pulls
Great quality control with a few mismatches or bends
Solid metal construction and sleek brushed appearance
cons: Longer screws may be necessary for drawers with thicker walls
A few reports of thread stripping and misalignment
Included screws are not of high quality

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy stainless great satin finish. Easy to install looks great.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great handle pulls; however, out of a box of 25, one was not usable since it did not have a threaded insert in one of the holes. Thus, I was only able to use 24 of the 25 handles.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: The good: very nice looking and sold cabinet handles for ...
customer_reviews.text: The good: very nice looking and sold cabinet handles for a reasonable price. The bad: we purchased a total of 45 pieces, about half had misalignment issues... we had to modify the wholes in the cabinet to be able to thread the screws and attach them. Most worked out ok that way but few handles still look visibly crooked. Not for the perfectionists...
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, uneven holes and too short screws
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Out of my 25 at least 18 were not threaded well so the screws didn't fit. Also, the screws were too short (1 inch) for using on drawers and cabinet doors. I had to go to Home Depot to buy 1.5 inch screws. When trying with the new, longer screws, the screws would not go in each hole all the way, some yes, some no. Now I have 18 unusable knobs and have wasted my money. Very unsatisfied about the quality. Recommend to the company to invest in quality control.
customer_reviews.author: E.O. Life Coach

customer_reviews.title: Wow these are great
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned at first what I was going to get due to the price being so great. I wavered back and forth on if I should take the risk and go with these and I wish I had not waited so long. These pulls are excellent I could not believe the quality for the price. My neighbor just put the same style pulls in their new kitchen and the paid $4.50 a peice for them they can't beilve how much I paid and how great they look. These pulls instantly made my kitchen look 10 years newer.
customer_reviews.author: adam chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality buy for quick cabinet update
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic handles! We desperately needed to update our cabinets, and these seemed like a great buy and were exactly what we needed. They fit the already drilled 3'' holes perfectly. They are well made and feel great on the hands for easy opening of cabinets and drawers. They look smashing with our newly painted white cabinets. The only thing is that we needed to get longer screws for the drawers as the ones that were included with the handles were insufficient for the thickness of the drawers. Other than that, we love these and they instantly modernized the space.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of this product, especially compared to similar overpriced products available at most local big-box stores. Sturdy and heavy feel with a very nice satin nickel finish. Installed using the Amerock TMP-MULTI Cabinet Door and Drawer Template as a guide for the holes and they came out perfect. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our kitchen remodel, at a great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these drawer pulls for our kitchen remodel. I had looked at something very similar in a local big-box home improvement store, where they were priced at $5 each. Since we needed 36, that wasn't going to work. I found these online, and they are almost exactly like the much higher-priced ones. These are a nice heavy weight and look great. Our contractor asked for the link, saying he'd like to order these for his own home. We're very pleased and would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Just Like I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I wanted. Came with the screws. Arrived quickly. They look awesome on my kitchen cabinets! Recently bought my house and my cabinets did not have any hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi V

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a great purchase. Heavy, solid units. was able to screw right in. Home Depot sales these for $5.66 each. I needed 25. Cost me $1.48 through amazon. Individually packed and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN Coles

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous bargain
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love these classy, solid pulls. Buying a new house and already ordered these to,go in the new kitchen. One caveat-before installing, make sure the screws thread all the way in. I did find some faulty ones, about four in all out of the box, but that doesn’t stop the five star review. Also, know in advance that you are going to have to go to the hardware store and buy longer screws if installing on drawers. The included screws aren’t long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lnzy

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, though the aesthetics didn't end up working for us
customer_reviews.text: Every single pull of the 25 was well=made and easy to install. We had no problems with them at all. That said, I found the vertical and horizontal lines of this to be a little too busy for our combined kitchen/dining/living room (we have a lot of drawers and cabinets), so I'm donating them to Habitat for Humanity. I decided that for our small space I'd prefer simpler arch pulls instead. That said, this manufacturer seems to have outstanding quality control, and I can't knock the product just because the aesthetics didn't work in our space.
customer_reviews.author: AbbeyDove

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, low price, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These were one of the greatest finds for my kitchen project. I didn't want to pay the price of the home improvement stores. I'm SO glad I searched Amazon because this value is unbeatable! These are heavy duty pulls, very well made. All came individually wrapped with their screws which made it easy to install them. When drilling my cabinets for these, I realized how cheaply made the cabinets are but these pulls make them look very expensive. I didn't have any issues with any threading on the 20 I used out of my 25, as I saw some other reviews mentioned. All worked perfectly for me !
customer_reviews.author: UAstudentn

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet Bling!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, no kitchen should ever go without cabinet hardware. So many people think it's not necessary, but they're wrong. Cabinet bling is so important for both for function and for style. I personally really like these because they can bring an updated and sleek look to most cabinet door styles. You can buy this same hardware at Home Depot or Lowes but you'll pay so much more... Don't do it! You can't beat this price online! You NEED cabinet bling in your life!
customer_reviews.author: James Judge

customer_reviews.title: Solid, nice finish, heavy quality feel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 x 25 packs to replace cheap crummy plastic kitchen and bath drawer / cabinet pulls installed by the prior owner. These are solid & have a nice finish, look great & were pretty easy to install. You may have to buy longer screws separately, as the 1" screws supplied won't be long enough for drawers/cabinets thicker than 1/2" (I bought 8-32 x 1-3/4). Only ding is that two of the 43 pieces I installed were defective - female threads were mis-tapped on one and one of the handle 'standoff' studs was stripped on another. Moral of the story: buy a few extras, they're a LOT less expensive than those sold at the big box home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Martens

customer_reviews.title: Tons of handles for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: These are so sturdy and look amazing in my kitchen. Such a great price!! I’m very happy with them and have recommended them to my friends who want to update their kitchen handles. I did have to use longer screws than what was offered, but that is due to having thick real oak cabinet doors and drawers. It wasn’t an issue, I just reused the previous handle screws and problem solved. Would buy again, but it came with so many handles that I had left overs:)
customer_reviews.author: Tomi iverson8

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement, difficult addition.
customer_reviews.text: If you are replacing your cabinet hardware, these are great. If you are adding hardware to new cabinets and drilling the holes, these are a challenge. Because you have to drill two holes in very specific locations, I would not attempt to install these unless you have a brad point drill bit. This way you can be precise with your hole locations. Once I bought the appropriate drill bits, these went much smoother and faster. Make yourself a template, mark the locations, and drill away! They look great, feel sturdy (they've got weight to them), and I would buy them many times over at this price!
customer_reviews.author: DNT93

customer_reviews.title: Same quality, but at a lower price!
customer_reviews.text: After a visit to Home Depot, I did an Amazon search and found these beautiful, sleek, sturdy, elegant handles for the kitchen cabinets AT A FRACTION OF THE COST! The handles we'd bought (and have since returned) totaled $90, these are the same high quality handles (as far as I can tell) for 1/3 the price. The handles are now installed and they look great. No bad handles, no flaws, just easy installation. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Same handles at the store, but so much more affordable
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful in my cabinets. Since we live in a townhome and don’t want to dump a ton of money into it, we painted our awful melamine cabinets white and attached these handles to them. You wouldn’t believe the difference it made! And you absolutely can’t beat the price. We misplaced one of the handles (still hasn’t turned up, but I counted the handles in the box, so I know we had them all) so we had to go to Home Depot hoping they had the same kind as this. The exact same handles were at the store for triple or quadruple the price. So happy I could find these on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and look.
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet handle feels very sturdy and expensive. I was worried that, for the price, I would be disappointed in the feel of the pull. That is definitely not the case. They are heavy and study and look very nice on our new cabinets. The only reasons I knocked off a star are that the pulls did not come with a template for installation. Also, the provided 1" screws provided were long enough for the pulls going on the cabinets, but I need 2" screws for the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bosse

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one drawer pull from a big box store, $6.99 each. I ordered these because of the great reviews. They are far better than I thought they would be. Can not tell the difference in the one I bought verses the shipment I received. I did open every pull and tried all the screws in everyone. I only had 3 that the screws didn’t work. Tried different screws in different pulls. We haven’t installed them yet, but wanted to share what a great buy for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: These look great and feel quite solid
customer_reviews.text: Out of 75 of these, only one had threading issues. Not too shabby, given I usually bat .900 with Everbilt and Defiant big-box store-branded items. These look great and feel quite solid. The supplied machine screws are only long enough for cabinets so you'll need to invest in 2-inch screws for drawers. Some of the other brands out there offer both screws.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Solid Hardware
customer_reviews.text: This hardware is durable and very heavy which i LOVED. it didn't feel cheap at all!! I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 because I have shaker cabinets and the screws provided were WAY too short (something I wish I knew before), so I had to go to the hardware store and purchase longer screws. I believe I bought 1 1/4 inch and that worked perfectly. I get compliments on these a lot and they were such a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, looks great! You may need longer screws for the drawers though!
customer_reviews.text: These look great in my kitchen. Great complement to a light oak cabinet, blue/gray granite countertop with light tan tile floors. One thing though!!!! - Pay attention to the drawers. Since they are not on hinges, they likely are attached to a piece wood, which means you need a longer screw than provided About an inch longer. Not a big hassle, they can be picked up at any hardware store. But I do wish I had known that ahead of time and/or the companys elling these provided the option of also getting longer screws with the purchase specifically for drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great product, saved me lots of cash!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, quick shipment. Excellent quality, heavy and nice looking. Compared to what appears to be the same product at the big box store these handles were a third the cost (compared to the individual handle cost). Definitely save yourself some serious dollars if you are replacing several handles. Screws are included.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The price is right. While it was still a great buy, the threads have been a problem on two handles so far. On one handle, the threads were at an awkward and unusable angle. On the other problematic handle, one side was not threaded at all. Even with two being unusable, I saved a lot by purchasing these instead of going to my neighborhood big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi B.

customer_reviews.title: Compliments Stainless Steel Appliances....
customer_reviews.text: High quality, heavy cabinet hardware. All pieces arrived individually wrapped and packed securely in a durable box. All pieces were able to be used. No duds!! Longer screws were needed for drawers. Easy installation. I recommend a template to ensure holes are symetrical and level. Excellent value! The same hardware can be found at big box stores for triple the cost. Attractive, modern, and contemporary.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy handle to upgrade your cabinets
customer_reviews.text: This handle is solid with a really nice satin nickel finish. It makes a huge difference if you want to upgrade your existing hardware. The only downfall is it comes with the shorter screws only that are for your upper cabinets. For your drawers you need the longer screws, but my existing screws for my old handles fit just fine. My old handles were 2 centimeters wider so I had to drill the holes wider and that worked. The handle covered the hole completely so it worked out. I highly recommend these handles, and you cannot beat the price! Excellent value!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Daniels

customer_reviews.title: scratches but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are solid built feel. The packaging was perfect and shipping was fast. However, all of these have small imprefections (scratches) and if you care more about the price like myself it's okay. but I think this is a lower quality beause of imperfections and therefore much lower price. I think you get what you pay for is true in this case. I don't regret getting these because they were super cheap and who will walk up to a cabinet handle to inspect if it's scratched ? :)
customer_reviews.author: Arek Kosinski

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Renoing the travel trailer and have 50 pulls to replace. These are sturdy. I've installed five of the 25 so far using the screws from the old hardware with no issues. I'm on a budget and feared these were going to be cheap knock offs. Nope, not one bit. There may or may not be defective ones in the 50 I bought, but if you ever have bought in bulk, you know that's something you have to expect. There was another option that was less expensive and offered 5 more, but the reviews for this product were far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Neph

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These handles are great for my kitchen. Instantly upgrades it. Functional and high quality. However, I am assuming these were made in China or something, because upon installation I got metal splinters from them. Make sure you do a quick wipe down of each handle with a wet cloth or something similar before grabbing hold of these. Nonetheless, great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: b_huynh11

customer_reviews.title: Good product, rude sales rep.
customer_reviews.text: I like these. Half price of the identical ones from Home Depot. I bought 30+ for my kitchen and they look great. They go well with my SS appliances. Only problem was that one of my shipments was light by a couple units. When I called, the sales rep was a smart-ass about it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Check door/drawer thickness.
customer_reviews.text: Update... Have opened all and installed 38 so far. None wewe damaged. All accepted screws without a problem. One cant expect the screws to go into both sides easily unless both holes are drilled perpendicular to the face. .... This is a nice looking, well constructed handle. A good value in my opinion. I needed 50 of them. Be advised... the 1 inch 8x32 mounting screws provided were about 1/2 inch too short for the width of my kitchen drawers. I had to get longer screws for them. The cabinets worked fine with 1 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant as I worried about the quality and sturdiness given these were hollow. Pleasantly surprised at how sturdy they are. Once on, they look no different than the solid ones (I initially bought them but I required 2 different sizes and couldn't find the correct quantity). You really can't go wrong for the price and I'd have paid more, that is how pleased Ii am.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good qualiy-would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Received product today. Was well packaged, each handle separately and 2 screws in separate plastic to prevent scratches on handle. Opened one and measured hole distance with calipers: 3.00 inch spot on. Mounted 20 bars w/o any issues whatsoever. Look and feel great. Massive metal. I Was somewhat concerned after reading many critical reviews about missing / wrong threads. I cannot confirm any of these issues. Even if the remaining 5 are all screwed up, it’s still a good deal. I’m pleased with the product, so is customer
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Look good but.... there were issues
customer_reviews.text: I dropped 1 star because the screws didn't always easily thread on it was like there were some burs in the threads I actually got a tapper to be sure they would thread on. Also they only came with the smaller 1 1/2 in screws so if you have drawers that need the extra 1 in because of the mounted face you will have to either get new longer screws that fit or like in my case use the screws that were on the old hardware I got lucky they threaded on and were the same thread
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Gina Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very well made
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased these for cabinets we had recently installed. I was worried because some of the reviews were negative and said the holes didn't match up and the screws were not long enough. We did not have any problems installing them at all. These look very nice and I would say they are the same exact thing that you would buy for $4-$5 each. I would recommend these to anyone putting in new drawer pulls. We have had them up for about 2 months and I have not had any problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mglashauser

customer_reviews.title: Good Handles But Terrible Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The handles are very nice in appearance and heavyweight BUT fully half of the handles were defective. The screws would not fit in one side of the handle. I ended up having to order twice as many as needed and returning the defective ones. If you are willing to do that then they are still a pretty good deal. But the quality control is really a crap shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Greywulff

customer_reviews.title: Screws too short!
customer_reviews.text: Same review as I posted for the 2 inch pull. These pulls are heavy and solid, not hollow or cheap feeling. However the screws that are packaged with this product are 3/4 of an inch too short for application to my new cabinets. They do fit the cabinet doors, just not my drawers...they require a screw that is 3/4 of an inch longer, so of to home Depot in search of a 60 screws that are 1 3/4 inches long!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: I must have gotten a bad batch or something because the majority of the holes ...
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a bad batch or something because the majority of the holes weren't 3" apart. I had to redrill the holes a bit bigger to make it work. They eventually do look nice though, just a pain to have to "adapt" them to make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P. Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Really impressive quality pieces of cabinet hardware. Amazing value.
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would be do excited about a cabinet hardware - but these handles are really impressive ! They are hefty, solid, high quality items - and you cant go wrong with Amazon price. They sell for $6 EACH at Home Depot. The quick facelift for my kitchen was really nice. They are easy to install and fit perfectly into pre-drilled 3” holes. The only shortcoming is that my flatware drawers were thicker than regular cabinets - so I had to get longer bolts than the ones included. Wish they had both short and long ones included, but thats really minor.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sturdy handles
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Instantly updated my cabinets from the old knob style to a more modern pull bar. These handles have heft to them and are great quality. Each of the 25 I ordered were individually packaged with their hardware. When needing 2 more, I ordered a 5 pack, and same thing. Easy install. If replacing knobs, this does not come with a template, so you will need to create one or purchase a template.
customer_reviews.author: Ian K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used these on both my kitchen cabinets and drawers. + Looks nice, feels nice, and works perfectly. + Best of all, they were much less expensive than Home Depot or Lowes! - The included screws fit my cabinets, but I did have to get longer ones for the drawers. - Not as heavy/solid as ones you can get from Home Depot (but again for half the price this is still very decent). Save yourself some money, go with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these handles. They are not light weight. Very heavy. I like the Nickle finish because it gives the cabinets a rich touch. The original ones I got came in a set of 35 l think but I needed five more so l was fortunate that they sold them in a smaller quantity. They were extremely easy for my carpenter to install and I instantly got compliments once he was completed. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Knowles

customer_reviews.title: Strudy
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a while for sturdy cabinet hardware and so glad I found these! They are sturdy, heavy and not at all cheap looking. You will seriously not get more bang for your buck! I had found some very similar at Home Depot for about $6 a piece. I bought these for cabinets and drawers and had to purchase different screws as these were not long enough. But the box of screws only was about $5. Very easy installation. I bought two boxes of the 25 pkand only got one defected one.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all you can not beat the price and these are great quality. I bought these based on so many good reviews and I couldn't be happier. I am NOT handy at all but I watched some YouTube videos and thought it looked easy enough to do. I am so proud of myself haha I did need longer screws for the drawers so I just ordered some. I seen someone else that said they needed longer screws as well for their drawers and said they used 8-32x2 screws. Update on screws- they were to long for my drawers
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Big Upgrade for a Small Price
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, heavy weight, and solid. You would never guess they cost so little, because they read, "Quality." We replaced our kitchen cabinet handles with these, and it made the room look much younger and fresher. We likes them so much, we bought another box so we could give the same treatment to all of our bathrooms. That was four boxes, total. The difference in this house? Huge.
customer_reviews.author: Iconoclast

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Longer screws would be nice...  some some styles
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice quality. So far so good. I've only used half of them and haven't encountered any that weren't machined correctly like some have stated missing threads. Some of my drawers are older and thicker, so the screws were not long enough, have to go out and buy bunch that were longer at 1.25" instead of the 1" supplied.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sweets

customer_reviews.title: nice, but some sharp joints
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and everything about these pulls. Most of the pulls are great, but I can feel a rough edge on some of the joints when I pull on them. I don't think they're sharp enough to cut my finger, but any sharper and they might. Overall would definitely buy again. They're great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Best quality & price ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these handles from Home Depot, and paid $21 for a package of four. I was worried that the quality was going to be the same from Amazon. I just knew getting 25 handles for $28 they couldn’t be as nice. They are exactly the same handles. The best deal I have ever received. Thank you to Amazon and the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonide

customer_reviews.title: No brainer to spruce up the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Great product and exactly what I was looking for. The only thing to be aware of is if your drawers are thicker. Thankfully I had some longer screws left over from another set of handles that we bought, because otherwise these screws would not have fit. But they worked perfectly in the cabinets and every handle was sized perfectly and threaded right.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Solid bar construction, and all of them fit very well- an inexpensive way to update the look of the kitchen. I simply reused the existing longer screws for the pull drawers that required the longer screws, otherwise the screws that come with these handles are fine for all of my other standard cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: conecrusher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Update to kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Over the past year or so we updated our 1980's kitchen. New counters, new SS drop in range to match DW and Refer, new mosaic back splash. The cabinets are top quality oak but dated. The handles were pewter like and old looking. Tried half a dozen new brushed - satin pulls and settled on these. They look good and provide an updated look matching the appliances. Not a bad, low cost update. They seem pretty solid.
customer_reviews.author: Rf Foley

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING VALUE-SUPER BUY
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional value for the money. This is the best price we found for these modern drawer pulls. We have a very large kitchen that we wanted to update and this really did the trick. I ordered 75 drawer pulls and with my husband and me working together it only took us 2 hours to remove the old and install these pulls. Luckily, we could use our existing screws from the old hardware for this new hardware. The screws that came with the hardware were too short. Oh, one more thing, each piece was individually wrapped, and the pulls looked perfect. No nicks. Out of 75 pieces only one did not work for us. Yes I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: fastshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great modern drawer pulls
customer_reviews.text: I redid my cabinets in my kitchen about a year ago and wanted some affordable, modern drawer pulls to replace the old ugly ones. I found these and they are perfect. Over the last year, I haven’t had any issues with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Modern. A Must Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 50 of these to update the hardware in my kitchen and bathrooms. I was impressed with the sturdy quality of the handles. It was nice to have the screws included. I had to use the screws from my old hardware for the drawers only, because the ones provided were too short. It's amazing how these really made my kitchen and bathrooms more modern looking. You will not be disappointed with the quality and appearance of these handles.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and appearance.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two packages of these cabinet pulls to give our red oak cabinets a fresh, more modern look. We were quite surprised at the high quality of these pulls. We used all 50 of them and not a single one was "off" in any way. Each looks beautiful and each one fit our cabinets perfectly. These pulls are a great bargain, well below the cost of a similar item purchased in a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Swhoh

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but inconsistant
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these when my Mom said she needed an update in her kitchen... they look great but installation was tricky. A few of them fell apart at the screw post, and others had the screws going in at an angle. Once they were all installed, however, they looked fantastic and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dardis

customer_reviews.title: Great! The quality at this price point is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Only one word describes the these pulls. Great! The quality at this price point is amazing. They look great and not a single unit was faulty. One spacer came loose, but I tuned the retaining screw a bit, put it back together, and it works perfectly. As many reviews have stated...You can't get a similar pull for anywhere near this price. A great pull all the way around..Highly recommended. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rick Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great product! My kitchen looks very fancy now. Great packaging and fast delivery. I totally recommend this seller and product. You will not regret. I do recommend buying a template to install the pulls. It will make your life easier for sure.
customer_reviews.author: joel galloway

customer_reviews.title: Handles are nice but the screws with it are terrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: the screws are really weak and flimsy....I guess that's why its so cheap. see the pic - the screw broke off and their heads became flat. ruined 2 of my cabinet door.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewDoc

customer_reviews.title: Less than $2 each are you kidding me....
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is we bought 2 handles at Lowe's for $6 each then I searched Amazon and found these. They arrived Sat and we installed them all with no issues. Exact size and weight as the two from Lowe's and no one can tell which two those are among them all. They look exactly the same size and weight. No issues with threading on any of them, all 25 were the good. If after some use I experience issues I'll report back, but as of now they are solid and I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: theshawn

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat these cabinet handles. They are way cheaper than IKEA and I think look just as good, and are a really good weight. Not flimsy as all! We ordered the 25 pack only needing like 17 or so because other review mentioned some stripped screws and such; however, none of ours turned out to be faulty. Would definetly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and lovely to look at
customer_reviews.text: we had our handyman install the knobs on our cupboards and the handles on our drawers and they gave the whole areas in kitchen and bathrooms a luxury look plus they make it so much easier to open these cupboards and drawers. We are very pleased with them. And our handyman had no trouble installing them.
customer_reviews.author: luvtoread

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had a buddy of mine install these for me bc I've never installed hardware on cabinets before and didn't want to risk damaging the cabinet. When I saw how easy it was with the template I joined in and did the bathrooms and laundry room while he did the kitchen - Great handles super high quality and beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our new but ugly pulls with these. Very happy with the quality. The screws they came with didn't work for us but a trip to our local home improvement solved that problem. No big deal- I didn’t expect that they would be compatible wirh every cabinet out there.
customer_reviews.author: S. SmithTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but only one length screw
customer_reviews.text: These are quality! Very heavy and thicker than I imagined. I ordered a box of 25 and and a box of 10 because I needed 31. All had threads and screws. NOTE: these only come with 1” screws! I knew this from the description and also knew I needed longer, but my contractor already had longer ones and told me not to worry. I noticed that the more expensive brands usually come with two screw lengths, so know what you need before you order! If you need longer, that will be more cost and if may not be worth the savings. It still deserves 5 stars! Looks amazing with my stainless stee appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Smiller

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but hard to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, but hard to install. The distance between wholes isn't very consistent, so I needed cardboard to make wholes, and after that, had to open a little further to the right in order to fit. But it looks great, has a good weight, and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S. Coimbra

customer_reviews.title: A solid product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, has a nice weight to it. I wish it came with 2 different lengths of screws though like the other products I’ve browsed. The screw it came with worked well for my kitchen cabinets but I had to buy longer screws for my kitchen drawers. Overall though, I was very pleased with the look and function that I ordered another set so I can put handles on my bathroom cabinets and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great quality solid feel.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid feels good to the grip. Bought three sets and two for friends and they loved them too. Some of mine are at the shampoo bar at my salon and a lot of chemicals going on there . 1 year and no pitting or corrosion Best Buy in a long time
customer_reviews.author: John Banister

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these handles exceeded my expectation. I used 23 of the 25 and had no trouble at all with any of them. They fit perfectly through the draws and doors with plenty of thread on the screws to tighten securely - which I did with a hand screw driver. They are heavy, robust and look fantastic. I would certainly purchase these again. Great value for money and equally as good as the more expensive versions in Home Depot and Lowe’s.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous cabinet handles!! Fit my kitchen cabinets perfectly and really updated them as well!! Very sturdy, substantial and well made!! Excellent value for the money!! These handles are first rate and beautiful!! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't afford to put in new kitchen cabinets, so stripped off the old handles (circa 1980), painted the doors and fascia white, and added these for a completely updated, fresh, modern look at a fraction of the price. Since the pack only had 25 and I needed 27 I had to buy 2 in the hardware store - big price difference! I'm very pleased with the quality and appearance of these handles and totally delighted with my "new" cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Beattie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Heavier than I expected and MUCH cheaper than local home stores. The standoffs on all pieces were loose so I unscrewed all of them and put a dot of loctite on the threads and screwed back in finger tight. No issues with screws or threads (was an initial concern) and I had to buy longer screws for my drawers but not a big deal considering the money saved by ordering on Amazon. Overall a happy purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These pulls are great!!! They are heavy and of good quality and a fraction of the price of what you would buy at a home improvement store. I just switched out all of our old pulls in the kitchen with these and the room looks brand new. I'd recommend these to anybody!! The only issue folks might find is that the screws might be too short for their drawers, but I was able to just use the existing screws from the old hardware on my cabinets. But even if you had to buy new screws, the cost is still minimal and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great and excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I wanted my cabinets to have an updated look and they look great. They match my stainless steel appliances and that’s the look I wanted. They are easy to grab now instead of regular bronze knobs. I am very satisfied and got the updated satin stainless look. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Yor1lady

customer_reviews.title: nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I only need about 40 for the whole house on all our new cabinets and only 2 of them were defective, screws would not go in...no big deal since I ordered 50 of them. good feel to them and recommend but if you need the exact number you ordered I would check them all before return window closes
customer_reviews.author: John Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of handle pulls, read about the pros and cons (weight and material) and know that you could pay a lot more for the same looking handles, but why would you?! These are heavy-weight and I had zero trouble with a single one in my 25 pack purchase. I needed longer screws for some of my drawers and purchased 8 x 1 3/4" machine screws and all worked great!
customer_reviews.author: ~Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Install properly and they are just great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pulls work and look great! I have read some reviews that mention they do not line up and that some screws did not fit well. I installed 50 and each and everyone lined up perfect. I would suggest that perhaps the "alignment issue" may have been caused by one tightening one screw too tight or completely before attempting to tighten the other. This can lead to a cross threaded screw. Tighten each a little at a time so they pull in straight not cocked. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Schultz

customer_reviews.title: affordable facelift
customer_reviews.text: As a newbie DIYer, these get an A+ in my book. My only gripe, was there were two pulls that did not work due to the screws not being able to tighten in the pull. When you compare the price and quality to that of Home Depot, Lowes, etc., it's unbeatable! Really great quality pulls that look and feel much more expensive than its price tag. Great way to update your kitchen for a modern clean look. Definitely worth it and very much recommended! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Chia Moua

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the best bang for the buck for stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best bang for the buck for stainless steel. Very happy with the fit and finish. I used on 16 drawers and 5 doors in a workshop but would not hesitate to use in a luxurious kitchen or bathroom as well. I've used one of the extras already for a carry handle an a small fan which works great and I can wrap the cord around the handle easily. Perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Techguy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These handles are beautiful! They are so much heavier than I thought they would be. I didn’t get any undrilled ones like some of the reviews say, but some of them had minor scuffs on them. I just use those handles on more inconspicuous spots. I would definitely buy these again if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Strong handles, modern look
customer_reviews.text: I have had these new handles on for about 2 weeks. They are great heavy duty quality. Would have paid a lot more at a big box store. Love how it updated the look of my kitchen. We bought extras to do the bathrooms too. Only problem was it made us want to change the hinges too, lol. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: em34744

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! We updated our kitchen cabinets with some paint and really needed to update the hardware as well. Similar cabinet pulls were much more expensive at the hardware stores. After seeing all the good reviews on these I decided to take a chance and I'm so happy that I did. These are heavy duty and strong and they look great on my newly painted cabinets
customer_reviews.author: Stacey B.

customer_reviews.title: Need to be re-drilled
customer_reviews.text: Most of these handles had to be taken to the hardware store and redrilled because the screws did not work in them. There are two types of screws, metric and standard. These handles worked with neither. Once they were redrilled (I was fortunate they did not charge me!) it all worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: All were good
customer_reviews.text: I was prepared to have multiple bad handles in the package, based on other feedback. But I figured they would still be less expensive than the local big box hardware stores even with having to throw some away. All were perfect. They are the same quality as the big box stores at less than 1/3 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Amazing quality - very heavy! Box was one short, but when you consider that comparable pulls sell for almost $7 apiece at the big box hardware store it’s no problem to buy extra. Do yourself a favor and just buy an extra pack when you place your initial order so your job schedule doesn’t get off track.
customer_reviews.author: DDM11

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish, sturdy, heavy stainless steel cabinet pull outs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered pulls from two companies and the other one was cheaper and was shinier but was very light and hollow. These match the stainless steel appliances, make a big difference to the cabinets and very easy to clean with damp cloth. They are extremely expensive in the stores and even though I have a lot left over (I had to get 2 boxes), they still work out much cheaper than buying individually from Store. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed the the knobs
customer_reviews.text: Return this item for a different color but the handles was very nice and made a big difference to my kitchen cabinets also was very impress with the weigh of the handles of the ones that I received- ended up ordering the black knobs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: We had these pulls in our current home, put in by the developer. We had a condo we were renovating, and these handles are high quality and good hefty weight. However the screws were too short, but luckily the pulls we removed had the right length screws, and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these cabinet hardware install them in new rental properties I acquired. I ended up buying 3 more packs of 25 as I was very impressed with them. Not a single one was defective. The delivery was super fast on all of them, which was a bonus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pulls at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today. Not much to say that has not been said. They look great and appear to be of good quality. I am building a new house and will need lots of knobs and pulls. At less than $2 each, I am saving a bunch over the $6 price for a similar pull at Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Recorder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! They have a little weight to them. They're beautiful. They don't gather a bunch of fingerprints. Shape and size are consistent when you're drilling holes into the cabinets. I love everything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Anjoli Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase for a cabinet I was renovating
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for a cabinet I was renovating. I received these quickly from 'Cabinet Hardware 4 Less' faster than I expected, and promptly installed them. One of the five unfortunately did not install properly due to the threading of the screw not working with the threads inside the handle (Similar to a complaint from another purchaser here) ..... but after a quick email to the selling company, they sent out a replacement fast! So now all handles are on, look great, are solid, and this has been a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser X

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but wish there were 2 sizes of screws included
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and much more cost effective than other stores. My only issue with these is that in other sets I've seen them come with 2 different size screws (one for cabinets and one for drawers). This set only comes with one sized screw so you'll likely have to buy the correct size screws for your drawers. This is because most drawers are thicker than the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peters

customer_reviews.title: These handles give a beautiful and modern look to cabinets.
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet handles changed the way my whole kitchen looks. I love them. They are very sturdy and gives my cabinets a modern look. I won't even discuss the type of handles they replaced; but, I will say they were pretty ugly. You won't go wrong with these handles. We really love them and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Handles
customer_reviews.text: Love these handles. Very sturdy and great bulk price versus purchasing them separately at a home improvement store which would be almost twice as much. Easy to install. Screws and each handle did not have any cosmetic damage. Received in great condition and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised that these look and feel like high quality cabinet handles that were 4-5x the cost. They look great and worked with the template we bought off amazon. Our cabinets were thicker than 1”, so we did have to purchase longer screws at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Perfect Finishing Touch
customer_reviews.text: These are BEAUTIFUL. They completely changed the look of an "old" kitchen. We redid the counter tops, painted the cabinets and then these were the finishing touch and they are perfect, and AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: These were a great buy for what I needed. They have a nice weight to them and feel sturdy. I didn’t see the different length in the screws in the box for drawers. So I got the measurements from the description and went to Home Depot to get longer screws. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E

product_meta.title: Cosmas 305-030SN Satin Nickel Cabinet Hardware Euro Style Bar Handle Pull - 3" Hole Centers, 25 Pack
product_meta.description: Size Name:25 PackCosmas Hardware is the way to go when designing or fixing up your kitchen or bathroom. They do not make us charge unnecessary markups for their hardware like some of the other major brands do. Therefore, giving you great hardware at a price that you can afford. Go ahead, compare, we dare you.
feature_bullets: Individually Polybagged with 1" Mounting Screws Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,605 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
